slides.title: About Us
textlines: Digital Logic specializes in creating software businesses. We start from an idea that solves a market problem, assemble a team, develop the product leveranging our own technology and launch to the market as a new spin-off company.
We are specialist in software development and are currently focused on Deep Neural Networks, Aplications as a Service, Business Inteligence and Internet of the Things.

cards.text: Cloudware is a Cloud based accounting software for small businesses and accountants. Software as a Service (SaaS) with Billing, Purchases, Inventory, Accounting and Salaries.  Market leader in Portugal with over 70.000 active customers.

Fintech company for automatic fiscal fraud detection. Large scale analytics, fully simplifies and automates the audit process for Governments, Corporations and SME. Three European Tax Authorities and over 10.000 companies as customers.

Patent pending sub-threshold microchip architecture. The technology is able to reduce the power consumption in idle mode of any other microchip by several orders of magnitude, increasing 10 fold the batery lifetime of IoT systems.
